src:
REZZIME DANA (četvrtak): Volfzburg, Lacio i Ajntraht uprskali stvar
Pogledajte ko vam je 7. novembra doneo novac, a ko vas je prodao...

07 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici REZZIME DANA novinari portala MOZZART Sport koriste podatke kladionice MOZZART o najigranijim parovima tog dana, i na osnovu toga sumiraju koji su od najigranijih tipova prošli, a koji nisu.
OVDE pogledajte kako smo mi prošli u rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA.
Evo kako ste vi tipovali...

ZAOKRUŽENO
:


MANČESTER JUNAJTED - PARTIZAN (tip 1, kvota 1,38) - rezultat 3:0

Uzalud što je Savo Milošević želeo hrabro da se nadigrava, i on je nadigran od strane snažnog sastava koji je Solskjer izveo ne želeći da čeka još tri nedelje kako bi na hladnom istoku overavao plamsan u 1/16 finala. Mančester Junajted je bio neumoljiv i pobedom od 3:0 ne samo overio proleće u Ligi Evrope već i poslao crno-bele u tešku misiju.

VULVERHEMPTON - SLOVAN (tip 1, kvota 1,35) - rezultat 1:0

Vulverhempton se mučio tokom čitave utakmice, promašio je i jedanaesterac u 51. minutu, koji u pogodak nije uspeo da pretvori Ruben Neves. Gosti su se grčevito branili, ali su na kraju ipak poklekli. Čovek odluke bio je Raul Himenez, koji je jedini pogodak na utakmici postigao u drugom minutu nadoknade.

KRASNODAR - TRABZON (tip 1, kvota 1,45) - rezulat 3:1

U trku za drugo mesto u grupi s Bazelom vratio se i Krasnodar sjajnom partijom u trijumfom nad Trabzonom od 3:1. Blistao je iskusni Portugalac Manuel Fernandeš koji je dao prelepi pogodak petom za 2:0 u 34. minutu. Domaćin je poveo sedam minuta ranije autogolom Asana, dok je treći postigao u trećem minutu nadonade preko Ignjatjeva. Konačan rezultat postavio je Nvakeme minut kasnije.

ASTANA - AZ ALKMAR (tip 2, kvota 1,63) - rezultat 0:5

Posle šest komada u mreži Astane u Hagu pre dve sedmice, holandski predstavnik je projurio i Nursulatanom i maksimalnim učinkom u dvomeču sa Kazahstancima pokazao kakav fudbal igra ove sezone. Mladi tim iz Alkmara delovao je naspram domaćina kao profesor za fakultetskom katerdom, pa se maltene nijednog trenutka nije postavljalo pitanje hoće li doneti bodove sa prelaza Starog kontinenta u Aziju.

ESPANJOL - LUDOGOREC (tip 1, kvota 1,90) - rezultat 6:0

Espanjol je bio nemilosrdan protiv šampiona Bugarske, koji je još u 12. minutu, pri rezultatu 0:1 oostao bez isključenog Forstera. Domaćin je brojao do šest, a pogotke je postiglo šest različitih strelaca Melendo, Marmol, Vargas, Kampucano, Pedrosa i na kraju Fereira.

BRAGA - BEŠIKTAŠ (tip 1, kvota 1,50) - rezultat 3:1

Braga je danas i definitivno izbacila Bešiktaš iz igre, pošto ga je savladala na svom terenu sa 3:1 i sebi obezbedila prolaz u 1/16 finala. Dva gola za domaćina u prvom poluvremenu postigao je Paulinjo, dok je sa druge strane Bojd na kratko izjednačio rezultat u 29. minutu. Sve je praktično bilo rešeno u 44. minutu kada je isključen Lens. Konačan rezultat postavio je Eduardo u 81. minutu.

DIDELANŽ - SEVILJA (tip 2, kvota 1,18) - rezultat 2:5

Iz luksemburške oranice u 1/16 finala Lige Evrope. Ako je neki klub odavno kaparisao šou četvrtkom to je Sevilja, koja se odomaćila u drugom po jačini evrospkom klupskom takmičenju. Ekipa Đulena Lopetegija je završila posao i postala prvi klub koji je obezbedio proleće u Ligi Evrope, ubedljivom pobedom (četvrtom u nizu) nad Dudelanžom od 5:2.
PRCRTANO:

VOLFZBURG - GENT (tip 1, kvota 1,70) - rezultat 1:3

Za prolaz dalje visi i i Volfzburg koji je večeras doživeo šok na svom terenu protiv Genta – 1:3. U prošlom kolu je u Volfzburg u Belgiji ostao bez pobede zbog golova Jaremčuka, a danas je posle vođstva ostao i bez boda. Rani gol Vitora nije nagoveštavao ovakav ishod, ali je Jarmečuk na početku drugog poluvremena postigao spektakularan gol volejom sa 18 metara. A onda je odbrana Volfzburga pala na ispitima u vazdušnim duelima. Depotr glavom posle kornera, pa Ngadu Ngađui posle serije loših reakcija domaćih fudbalera su lansirali Gent na prvo mesto u grupi.

LACIO - SELTIK (tip 1, kvota 1,70) - rezultat 1:2

A imaće za čim da žali Lacio. I naš vezista Sergej Milinković Savič koji je bio jedan od tragičara. Rimljani su poveli golom glavom Ćira Imobilea i vratili se u igru za evropsko proleće. Igrali su bolje, tražili drugi gol, a onda ga primili. Sergej Milinković Savić je napravio veliku grešku pred svojim golom, na koju se nadovezala loša rekacija Radua i izjednačujući gol Foresta u 38. minutu, posle čega se sve okrenulo.

STANDARD - AJNTRAHT (tip 2, kvota 2,00) - rezultat 2:1

Sjajan gol Filipa Kostića iz slobodnog udarca nije bio dovoljan Ajntrahtu da ostane neporažen u Liježu protiv Standarda i da ostane u pol-poziciji za proleće u Evropi. na kraju je srpski reprezentativac bio jedan od tragičara... Sa Arsenalom koji je jednom nogom već prošao, za drugo mesto u grupi F u Ligi Evrope ćemo do kraja gledati žestoku bitku Ajntrahta i Standarda.
text:
DAY SUMMARY (Thursday): Wolfsburg, Lazio and Eintracht blow up
Look who brought you money on November 7th and who sold you ...

07 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the DAY SUMMARY section, MOZZART Sport reporters use the MOZZART bookmakers' data on the most played pairs of the day, summarizing which of the most played types have passed and which have not.
See here how we went in the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section.
Here's how you guys typed ...

ROUNDED
:


Manchester United - PARTIZAN (tip 1, odds 1,38) - result 3: 0

In vain that Savo Milosevic wanted to bravely compete, and he was outplayed by a strong squad that Solskjer made without wanting to wait another three weeks to certify the Flames in the 1/16 finals in the cold east. Manchester United were relentless and, with a 3-0 victory, not only certified Spring in the Europa League but also sent the Black and White on a difficult mission.

VULVERHEMPTON - SLOVAN (tip 1, odds 1,35) - result 1: 0

Wolverhampton struggled throughout the game, missing a penalty in the 51st minute, which failed to convert to Reuben Neves. The guests defended themselves frantically, but eventually knelt down. The man of the decision was Raul Jimenez, who scored the only goal in the second minute of play.

KRASNODAR - TRABZON (type 1, odds 1,45) - result 3: 1

In the race for second place in the group with Basel, Krasnodar also returned with a great game in the triumph over Trabzon of 3: 1. The brilliant Portuguese Manuel Fernandes shone with a beautiful shot to make it 5: 0 in the 34th minute. The home team led seven minutes early with an Asana goal, while the third scored in the third minute of the lead over Ignjatjev. The final score was set by Nvakeme a minute later.

ASTANA - AZ ALKMAR (tip 2, odds 1,63) - result 0: 5

After six pieces at the Astana network in The Hague two weeks ago, the Dutch representative made his way through Nursulatan and showed maximum effect in a bout with the Kazakhs to show what football is playing this season. The young Alkmaar team acted as host for the faculty cathedra against the host, so there was little doubt about whether to bring points from the crossing of the Old Continent to Asia.

ESPANJOL - LUDOGOREC (type 1, odds 1,90) - result 6: 0

Espanyol was ruthless against the champion of Bulgaria, who in the 12th minute, with a score of 0: 1, was ruled out without Forster. The home side counted to six, with scores from six different scorers Melendo, Marmol, Vargas, Kampucano, Pedrosa and finally Fereira.

BRAGA - BEŠIKTAŠ (type 1, odds 1.50) - result 3: 1

Braga today definitely got Besiktas out of the game, having beaten him at home 3-1 and securing a pass in the 1/16 finals. Paulinho scored two goals for the hosts in the first half, while on the other hand Boyd evened the score in the 29th minute. Everything was practically resolved in the 44th minute when Lance was off. The final score was set by Eduardo in the 81st minute.

DIDELLANGE - SEVILLE (Type 2, Odds 1.18) - Result 2: 5

From the Luxembourg plow to the 1/16 finals of the Europa League. If a club has long promoted the show on Thursdays, it is Seville, which has taken home the second-strongest European club competition. Gulen Lopetegi's team finished the job and became the first club to secure a Europa League spring, a convincing win (fourth in a row) over Dudelange 5-2.
PRCRTANO:

Wolfsburg - Gent (tip 1, odds 1,70) - result 1: 3

Wolfsburg, who had a shock on his pitch against Ghent tonight, also hangs for the pass - 1: 3. In the last round he lost to Wolfsburg, Belgium without a win due to Jaremchuk goals, and today he lost a point after the lead. Vitor's early goal did not hint at this outcome, but Yarmechuk scored a spectacular 18-yard volley at the start of the second half. And then the defense of Wolfsburg fell in the air duel exams. Depot head after a corner, then Ngadu Ngađui after a series of bad reactions from local footballers launched Ghent to the first place in the group.

LACIO - Celtic (tip 1, odds 1,70) - result 1: 2

And he will have regrets for Lazio. And our midfielder Sergej Milinkovic Savic, who was one of the tragedians. The Romans took the naked head of Cyrus Imobile and returned to play for the European Spring. They played better, asked for another goal, and then received it. Sergei Milinkovic Savic made a big mistake in front of his goal, which was further compounded by Radu's poor reaction and equalizing Forest's goal in the 38th minute, after which everything turned.

STANDARD - Eintracht (tip 2, odds 2,00) - result 2: 1

Filip Kostic's brilliant goal from a free kick was not enough for Eintracht to remain undefeated in Liege against the Standard and remain in pole position for spring in Europe. in the end, the Serbian national team was one of the tragic players ... With Arsenal already one leg past, for the second place in Group F in the Europa League we will see the fierce battle between Eintracht and Standard.
